name: Weebly
description: Build an amazing website with tools to help your website, blog or online store come to life

configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter
configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector

configuration.name: Site ID
configuration.description: The ID of the Site you want to base this instance on. Is obtained during the OAuth2 flow

configuration.name: OAuth Final Callback URL
configuration.description: The URL to redirect the user to finish the oauth flow

configuration.name: Filter null values from the response
configuration.description: Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses.

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings

resources.description: Get a list of your sites Customers. (Mapped to Members)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

parameters.name: returnTotalCount
parameters.description: Optionally return the total count of records

resources.description: Create a product
Delete a product
Retrieve a product based on ID
Update a product
Replaces the given product. Use this to copy an existing product by replacing the product_id and updating other fields. Any fields not sent will be copied from the product used in the request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The product ID to be replaced
